name: Tibvps
tagline: An all-in-one installer for everything such as vestacp, postgresql, memcached ... for your vps
body:
## Language
_Bash shell_
***
## Description
This script is used base on [VestaCP](//vestacp.com) or without it. For automatically installing, checking running status, uninstalling ... web dev softwares like memcached, mysql, postgresql, apache ... without putting a hand on any command lines.
***
## Installation
```shell
curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TitanBox/tibvps/master/latest/tib
```
***
## Example
### _Check existence_
```shell
// check if vesta installed or check if the software supports your pc
bash tib vesta
--> service:vesta is not installed or action: is not allowed.
bash tib vesta supported
--> supported
```
### _Install a software_
```
// install VestaCP
bash tib vesta install
// install Memcached
bash tib memcached install
```
### _Get information_
```
// get postgresql real service name or check if it is running
bash tib postgre name
--> postgresql
bash tib postgre running
--> running
```
### _Uninstall software_
```
// fresh uninstall for vestaCP
bash tib vesta uninstall
```
### _Ultilites_
```
// os name
bash tib os name
// os version
bash tib os version
// reset all ip config
bash tib ip reset
// save current ip config
bash tib ip save
```
And many other things. Use it with your freedom and wisdom :smile:
***
## Update
This script will update to the latest version when you call
```shell
bash tib update
```
By the way, if you want to see software credit
```shell
bash tib about
```

## Good luck
